overview: In the far reaches of no man's land, a battle rages like no other.  It's gunfire pounds like a drum, with gore that rains over the wasteland like a tsunami. It seems infinite, an endless barrage of hardship and suffering. Until one day, when a rogue soldier rises from the ashes and ends it all.  This is the story, of a war so deadly, you can barely see it. This is 1FPS.
tagline: A war so deadly, you can barely see it
title: 1FPS
